com.bandyer.android_sdk.module

Interface BandyerModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BandyerComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CallModule, ChatModule, FileSharingModule, ScreenSharingModule, WhiteboardModule

    public BandyerModule
extends BandyerComponent

    A Module is a component of the SDK. A bandyer module has a status, a name and exposes a function to reconnect in case of failures.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.bandyer.android_sdk.BandyerComponent

        BandyerComponent.CallComponent, BandyerComponent.ChatComponent, BandyerComponent.FileSharingComponent, BandyerComponent.WhiteboardComponent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getReconnectionAttempts()
      Reconnection attempts already performed
      BandyerModuleStatus getStatus()
      Status of the module
      void reconnect()
      Call this function to launch a reconnection with this module.
